website_summaries.verdict: The ease of installation and no-glare LED lighting are the primary benefits of this flame-retardant thermoplastic model.
pros: Quick connect feature makes installation fast and easy
Thick thermoplastic housing will avoid damage in a fire to continue working through an emergency
NiCad battery backup maintains lighting during a power outage
LED lighting fixtures are designed to avoid glare, simplifying the egress procedure during an emergency situation
cons: Some users report these LED lights are dimmer than some bulb-lit models

customer_reviews.title: Thank you Reviewers for Fixing Problem on installation!!!
customer_reviews.text: Overall great exit lights for the price-point! As other reviewers have noted - Make sure to plug in the battery or they will not work right! (this step isn't mentioned in the instructions!) "It seems that the issue is due to the batteries not being connected. Take in mind that the batteries on these units come disconnected so that they do not get drained during transit. Can you please make sure that the batteries are connected after the installation is complete. Please allow the batteries to charge for at least 48 hours before testing the exit sign. If you continue to experience the same issue, please contact us directly so that we may further assist you."
customer_reviews.author: Monica A.

customer_reviews.title: Works great, perfect customer service
customer_reviews.text: My first one was delivered broken. They replaced it, no questions asked, and very quickly. I read a lot about the wiring issues. I wired it just like the instructions said, and had no issues. The sign and emergency lights work perfect. The only thing is... Remember to plug in the battery first!! It doesn't say that anywhere in the instructions. Do that, and you'll have no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Thurman

customer_reviews.title: Easy, Basic installation, Great replacement for old Incandescent Models
customer_reviews.text: Had a battery go bad on a fire exit light. Given the cost of a new battery this replacement was a good option plus the led lights are much brighter than the incandescent lights they replaced. These lights don't use Sealed Lead Acid batteries like the older models. This makes the overall product much lighter, although ,I am unsure how the new battery chemistry will affect longevity. The batteries in this model are user replaceable.

customer_reviews.title: Light Fixture Industries did a great job of getting the exit light to me on ...
customer_reviews.text: Light Fixture Industries did a great job of getting the exit light to me on time and undamaged. The light is a quality light but the instructions leave a lot to be desired. But even with the poor instructions it was a fairly easy install and the exit light and emergency lights work well. They are much brighter than the emergency lights I am replacing. All in all I am very satisfied with the purchase and will buy from them again.

customer_reviews.title: Smooth installation

Only took about a half hour to replace 3 old exit and emergency lights with these 3 combos.
